meanings.definition: To repair or replace the heel of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: She was reheeling her favorite boots to make them look new again.
meanings.sent2: The cobbler was reheeling the worn-out shoes for his customers.
meanings.sent3: The shoemaker joked that he was a master at reheeling shoes, but not at dancing.
meanings.sent4: Reheeling the shoes was like giving them a second chance to walk in comfort.
meanings.sent5: After reheeling her heels, she felt like she could conquer any path ahead.

meanings.definition: The act of fixing or replacing the heel of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: The reheeling of her favorite pumps made them look brand new.
meanings.sent2: He learned the art of reheeling from his grandfather who was a skilled cobbler.
meanings.sent3: The reheeling of the shoes turned them into fashionable footwear once again.
meanings.sent4: The reheeling process transformed the old shoes into stylish and comfortable ones.
meanings.sent5: With proper reheeling, even old shoes can regain their charm and functionality.
